meanings.definition: A person in charge of a group of workers.
meanings.sent1: The chargehand supervised the workers on the construction site.
meanings.sent2: The chargehand led the team of builders efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The chargehand joked with the workers to keep the atmosphere light.
meanings.sent4: The chargehand was the captain of the worker's ship.
meanings.sent5: The chargehand's authority was evident in the way the workers respected him.

meanings.definition: To assign tasks to workers as a chargehand.
meanings.sent1: He chargehands the team by delegating tasks effectively.
meanings.sent2: She chargehands the crew with precision and clarity.
meanings.sent3: The chargehand quickly distributed the tasks like a pro.
meanings.sent4: The manager chargehands the team, ensuring everyone has a job.
meanings.sent5: They chargehand the group, making sure each worker knows their role.

meanings.definition: The position or role of a chargehand.
meanings.sent1: She was proud to hold the chargehand position in the company.
meanings.sent2: The chargehand role requires strong leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The chargehand position comes with added responsibilities.
meanings.sent4: His chargehand role made him a key figure in the team.
meanings.sent5: The chargehand position is crucial for coordinating the workers effectively.
